casebody.data:
STATE
v.
FRANKLIN. 1998-2061 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 14, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion to set execution date. Motion granted. Antonio Sanchez Franklin's sentence shall be carried into execution by the warden of the Southern Ohio Correctional Facility, or in his absence, by the deputy warden on Thursday, January 12, 2023, in accordance with the statutes so provided.
